# NSCacheDelegate

**Protocol**

The delegate of an [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSCache] object implements this protocol to perform specialized actions when an object is about to be evicted or removed from the cache.

## Declaration

```swift
protocol NSCacheDelegate : NSObjectProtocol
```

## Responding to Object Eviction

- **cache(_:willEvictObject:)**: Called when an object is about to be evicted or removed from the cache.

## Managing the Delegate

- **delegate**: The cache’s delegate.

## Inherits From

- NSObjectProtocol

items.description: Called when an object is about to be evicted or removed from the cache.
